title: Is Covid testing hidden microchiping? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is Covid testing hidden microchiping? First, COVID-19 is a virus. It puts nothing into your body except itself. It tests nothing (except, maybe, our patience). This virus doesn’t care about you, just your lung cells to have sex in and make millions of tiny virus babies. If you’re referring to that hilarious plan to insert into each syringe of vaccine a microchip to Activate the virus and kill us,Render us all sterile, per evil Bill’s nefarious plan of population control,Create an ultimate Big Brother, who follows everybody ALL of the time,Or any other reason, no matter how impossible or just plain crazy, just stop. For the love of all that’s holy, give it up. Even asking these kinds of questions may make others believe that you’ve gone round the bend.

I stopped awarding my Dumb Quora Question of the Day because there are so many dumb people out there. But this is truly a really dumb question. Really, if you are dumb enough to believe that people can be tracked by microchips, then I have some tin-foil hats for sale. The closest technology that exists are the microchips we put into our pets. If your pet gets lost, you can’t just go on a website and say “where’s my dog?”. The only way to read the chip is by passing a receiver over the chip, usually at a vet’s office. The range of those things is an inch or less. The technology simply doesn’t exist to track anyone who has been microchipped. (Except in the movies).
